LanguageData.DDJY_CommandRandomlyExtractGenesDesc: Extract part of the soul at the cost of losing part of the body
LanguageData.ConfirmExtractXenogermWillKill: Warning: {PAWN_nameDef}'s soul is undergoing fusion. Extracting the soul before its fusion will kill {PAWN_objective}.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.MessageXenogermCancelledMissingPack: {0_labelShort}'s soul fusion ceremony is canceled: essential soul stone missing.
